page.title: 11A Day in the Life of Zoey
page.content: On Thursdays I get up and go down the stairs and I have some breakfast, then I get washed and dressed, brush my teeth and brush my hair.If there is time I play for a bit,then at half past 8 I take my lunch box and a bag for my swimming and go to school. When I get there we have the register then we do a bit of work before we go swimming. I can do front crawl and backstroke and breaststroke. When we get back it is playtime. After play, we do a bit of work then we go to dinner-play and afterwards, we have our dinner and then we go out to play again. After play, we have silent reading, then we do a bit of work until playtime. We do a bit more work then until it is hometime. When I go home sometimes I just play then I go and have my tea. At half past 8, I go to bed.
